posts.post_content:
Here is the fourth and final installment of Negro League Baseball items. Please see below scans along with key details, you can either PM or e-mail me at: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url].

1935 Santa Clara Team Photo w/Martin Dihigo (HOF), Willie Wells (HOF) & Alejandro Oms

Photo measures approximately 5 1/2" X 8"        $N/A
